name: too many pills
description:
too many pills

Cure the patients of their maladies by crushing the germs in a line with the same flavour of pill.

Unfortunately crushed pills cause dangerous side effects, monitor the vital statistics and don't use too many pills or the patient will expire.

controls:

 w + s: swap!

a: rotate left

d: rotate right

left + right arrows: move horizontally

up + down arrows: change menu option

space: select menu option

esc: exit

Forgot to implement a level-cleared condition until it was too late. Even if you clear a level you'll just have to let the patient die anyway and then change the level on the menu to the next...

Unfortunately, I didn't have time before the deadline to upload the wasm build either. If you want to play it on other platforms the source and everything are  at https://github.com/ickshonpe/too_many_pills.
